t: Amazon.com: DaVinci Gourmet Classic Raspberry Syrup, 25.4 Fluid Ounces (Pack of 1) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: THE NOT SO GOOD STUFF ABOUT THESE SYRUPS: - It seems that we have to add at least TWICE as much of this DaVinci Gourmet Classic Egg Nog Syrup into our hot drinks and for cooking. - We have to use so much more of this syrup that we ever used with other brands, so 1 star off for that!
